name: AS_GCM_QNM_CPS_displayQuestion_SINGLE_RADIO_BUTTON_TEXT
description: Interface used to display simple radio button questions
sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!responseOptions: rule!AS_CO_UT_filterCdtByField(
    cdt: ri!question.responseOptions,
    field: "fieldKey",
    value: null
  ),
  rule!AS_CO_CP_radioButtonField(
    label: ri!question.label,
    choiceLabels: local!responseOptions.label,
    choiceValues: local!responseOptions.value,
    saveInto: if(
      ri!disableSaves,
      {},
      append(
        a!save(
          ri!question,
          rule!AS_GCM_QNM_UT_updateQuestionFieldResponsesForSelectionBasedField(
            question: ri!question,
            fieldKey: null,
            selectedValues: save!value
          )
        ),
        rule!AS_CO_UT_replaceNull(
          nullableValue: ri!additionalSaveInto,
          replacementValue: {}
        )
      )
    ),
    value: rule!AS_GCM_QNM_UT_filterToResponsesForQuestionByFieldKey(question: ri!question).value,
    labelPosition: "ABOVE",
    validations: rule!AS_GCM_QNM_VD_evaluateResponseRequirementsForField(
      question: ri!question,
      questionMetadata: ri!questionMetadata,
      fieldKey: null,
      returnValidationMessage: true
    )
  )
)
